ca.uqac.lif.labpal.server

Class TemplatePageCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.jerrydog.RequestCallback
      • ca.uqac.lif.jerrydog.RestCallback
        • ca.uqac.lif.jerrydog.RestCleanCallback
          • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.server.WebCallback
            • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.server.TemplatePageCallback
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllPlotsLatexCallback, ClaimCallback, CustomPageCallback, EditParametersFormCallback, ExperimentPageCallback, ExperimentsPageCallback, ExplainCallback, HelpPageCallback, HomePageCallback, MacrosPageCallback, PlotsPageCallback, StatusPageCallback, TablePageCallback, TablesPageCallback, UnavailableCallback

    public class TemplatePageCallback
extends WebCallback
    Callback for a template page. This callback loads an internal HTML file with the same name as the HTTP request, and replaces all instructions of the form {!file.html!} by the contents of file.html at that location (thus providing a basic templating mechanism).
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

      • createStaticLinks

        protected static java.lang.String createStaticLinks(java.lang.String contents)
        Replaces dynamic links in a page by static links. For example, the line experiment/2?reset will be replaced by experiment/2.html.
        Parameters:
        contents - The original contents of the page
        Returns:
        The page with static links

      • relativizeUrls

        protected static java.lang.String relativizeUrls(java.lang.String contents,
                                                 java.lang.String path_to_root)
        Converts absolute URLs into relative URLs
        Parameters:
        contents - The original contents of the page
        path_to_root - The relative path to the root from the page to be converted
        Returns:
        The page with static links

      • exportToStaticHtml

        public java.lang.String exportToStaticHtml(java.lang.String path_to_root)
        Exports the page as a static HTML page
        Parameters:
        path_to_root - The relative path to the root of the lab
        Returns:
        The contents of the page
